1.0.name: wordpress/flipbook-catalog-with-woocommerce-link
1.0.description:
Creating a HTML5 (NO FLASH) Flipbook Catalog linked to your Woocommerce Products or any image has never been easier.

(See Demo of Product Here and Flip Through the Book)

(Get the Pro Version With Wish List and More Functions Today)

This plugin lets retailers or any one desiring a flipbook catalog to:

  • Create unlimited number of flip books.
  • Add unlimited number of of items to the flip book be they images or products from Woocommerce.
  • Select from 2 different page layouts - 1 image per page or 2 images per page (PRO VERSION HAS MORE LAYOUTS).
  • Allows to display items on both sides of the page or only on the left or right right side of page.
  • Design custom cover page for catalog.
  • Display item names and prices on product rollover.
  • Customi
